content: Analyze current SuperWhisper voice transcription workflow to identify UX pain points and accessibility challenges
Design comprehensive user research methodology for voice interaction optimization and Spanish-to-English technical instruction patterns
Develop inclusive design practices for voice input accessibility with WCAG compliance for auditory and cognitive accessibility
Create scalable voice workflow systems integration architecture with real-time transcription accuracy enhancement
Design frontend architecture for voice command processing with error handling and confidence scoring
Establish comprehensive design system for voice workflow management with component library and interaction patterns
Develop voice transcription accuracy enhancement patterns and user experience flow optimization strategies
Create comprehensive recommendations for maintaining Claude Code framework integrity while improving voice workflow efficiency
